Description: Fragment of thick, undyed, weft-faced plain weave, woollen textile with tapestry band (single warp threads); Band in purple (mix of dark blue and red fibres) and brown wool; Holes probably indicate presence of linen (now lost); Design in band probably a wave border; Warp: S spun wool, c.11tpc; Weft: S spun wool, c.45-50 tpc; Edges: cut or ragged;
Curator's comments: Previous location cupboard O; Found, 1988, in packet in Mr James (Keeper) room; Information from Hero Granger-Taylor (1991)
Condition: Poor; Fairly strong but ragged and stained
